basics.name: Brandon Perfetti
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Engineer with 10 years of proven leadership and meaningful contributions to teams of varying size and scope. With my results-driven mentality and growth mindset, I transform teams by seeking, learning, and teaching new/efficient technologies that make aggressive deadlines consistently achievable.

work.name: Lone Wolf Technologies
work.summary:
• Lead architecture and UI/UX design in refactoring our legacy data ingestion tool with React, Typescript, React Router, React Query, GraphQL, Headless UI, and Tailwind CSS with intent to serve data to 3 additional applications. 
• Minimized the time to integrate a new data source by 5x and allowed admins and the support team to address data discrepancies same day. 
• Crafted a roadmap and subsequent JIRA tickets with Figma designs for the front end team to execute on in a six month time table. 
• Wrote clear and concise documentation for Admins and API users. 
• Productized and monetized our exhaust in selling back our mapped and normalized data to third parties.
highlights: Leadership in Architecture and UI/UX Design

work.name: W+R Studios
work.summary:
• Developed a data ingestion tool to automate and administer data mapping and record ingestion with React, GraphQL, XState, and Styled Components. 
• Managed 250+ individual data feeds with daily record updates of 100K+, ~10M records in total; serving data to a suite of 5 customer facing applications via a GraphQL API . 
• Lead QA of each new integration ensuring a 1:1 of source data with limited latency for the end user.

work.name: W+R Studios
work.summary:
• Partnered with designers and marketing representatives of Real Estate Brokers nationwide to build and customize themes and reporting using HTML, CSS, Javascript. 
• Expanded the reach and scope of each theme by introducing team and region specific content; maximizing engagement and retention. 
• Assisted in Account Management and Support.

work.name: W+R Studios
work.summary:
• Integrated data from participating MLSs via RETS and RESO WebAPI with intent to expand nationwide market reach. 
• Integrated SSO with 100+ third parties to ensure smooth onboarding for account and enterprise users. 
• Streamlined data integration process, enabling rapid onboarding of new MLS data sources using Ruby on Rails to map and transform data.

certificates.name: These can be found on my GitHub
